question:
You have recently applied for a course at a college and have been accepted. However, you cannot join the course due to some reasons.
Write a letter to the principal of the college. In your letter:

which course you have been applied for
why you cannot join the course
ask about the possibility of the course in the future
Write at least 150 words.

You do NOT need to write any addresses.
text: I, Kuljeet Kaur, an aspirant whose application is accepted by the college, writing this letter to let you know that I am unable to join the course due to personal reasons.

Last month, I applied for Post graduate diploma in management  and I am very curious when I got a letter from your side that contains a  document stating that my application is accepted by the college. Even though a scholarship is also provided to me because of my good marks in the last program.

I wish to study this subject as I want to prepare myself for this field and want to be a Manager in future. However, after a few days,  I came to know that my father has got a promotion and we have to move to another city because of his seniority. I also have to accompany my parents as I am not able to do my household chores alone, which is why I cannot attend classes at this institute.

I want to pursue this course and want you to please let me know if I am eligible to apply for this course  next year as I will be back in this city by the upcoming year. In addition to it, I also want to  inquire if I got that scholarship at that time or not.
Hope to get a reply from your side.
